exercise_description: Design a RESTful API for a simple library system to manage books. The API should allow users to create, read, update, and delete book records. Each book should have a title, author, and ISBN. Ensure to handle basic validation for the inputs.
agent_feedback:
Great job on implementing the Fibonacci sequence correctly! Your code is clear and easy to follow, which is a real strength. To enhance it further, consider optimizing the efficiency for larger values of n and adding input validation to handle edge cases like negative numbers or non-integer values. Keep up the good work!
